body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If this may be security issue, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:
I cloned `k8s.io/code-generator` and tried to run `generate-groups.sh` from my project's directory (`~/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark`). It failed:

```
andy@Heptios-MacBook-Pro:~/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark (real-restic-andy) ~/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/generate-groups.sh all github.com/heptio/ark/pkg/generated github.com/heptio/ark/pkg/apis ark:v1 --go-header-file hack/boilerplate.go.txt
can't load package: package github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/defaulter-gen: cannot find package "github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/defaulter-gen" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.10.2/libexec/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/defaulter-gen (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/andy/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/defaulter-gen (from $GOPATH)
can't load package: package github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen: cannot find package "github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.10.2/libexec/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/andy/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/client-gen (from $GOPATH)
can't load package: package github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/lister-gen: cannot find package "github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/lister-gen" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.10.2/libexec/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/lister-gen (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/andy/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/lister-gen (from $GOPATH)
can't load package: package github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/informer-gen: cannot find package "github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/informer-gen" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.10.2/libexec/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/informer-gen (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/andy/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/informer-gen (from $GOPATH)
can't load package: package github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/deepcopy-gen: cannot find package "github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/deepcopy-gen" in any of:
        /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.10.2/libexec/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/deepcopy-gen (from $GOROOT)
        /Users/andy/go/src/github.com/heptio/ark/Users/andy/go/src/k8s.io/code-generator/cmd/deepcopy-gen (from $GOPATH)
```

**What you expected to happen**:
It should work without error. We need to support running the script from other projects so the generators can locate and use the go source files from a project's vendor directory.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: code-generator: generate-groups.sh doesn't support running from other directories
